mapper.select: SELECT place_uid "uid", title, contentId, mapx, mapy, addr1, tel, firstimage2 FROM place WHERE contentTypeId = 32 ORDER BY place_uid
SELECT place_uid "uid", title, contentId, mapx, mapy, addr1, tel, firstimage2 FROM place WHERE contentTypeId = 39 ORDER BY place_uid
SELECT place_uid "uid", title, contentId, mapx, mapy, addr1, tel, firstimage2 FROM place WHERE contentTypeId = 12 ORDER BY place_uid
